edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal

Class CmtElGamalWithProofsCommitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal.CmtElGamalCommitterCore
      • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal.CmtElGamalOnGroupElementCommitter
        • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal.CmtElGamalWithProofsCommitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CmtCommitter, CmtOnGroupElement, CmtWithProofsCommitter, CommitSecLevel, PerfectlyBindingCmt, SecureCommit, SecurityLevel

    public class CmtElGamalWithProofsCommitter
extends CmtElGamalOnGroupElementCommitter
implements CmtWithProofsCommitter
    Concrete implementation of committer with proofs. This implementation uses ZK based on SigmaElGamalKnowledge and SIgmaElGamalCommittedValue.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CmtElGamalWithProofsCommitter(Channel channel)
      Default constructor that gets the channel and creates the ZK provers with default Dlog group.
      CmtElGamalWithProofsCommitter(Channel channel, DlogGroup dlog, int t, java.security.SecureRandom random)
      Constructor that gets the channel, dlog, statistical parameter and random and uses them to create the ZK provers.

      Proves that the committed value with the given id was x.
